resource.chars: 一　小笠原備前守持長申備中國草間村

resource.chars: 惣領職付庶子分同村内宮地条事

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3661,3840h-307v-3840h307v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 就雅樂修理亮持忠譲与持長為持忠之甥守護人非分押領

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3329,3840h-234v-3840h234v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 由申之　御定不知行之文書相續如何仍被訪

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M3058,3840h-282v-3840h282v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 評定衆同奉行人等意見之處為叔姪近親文

resource.chars: 書相傳事被載文永追加之上者不能左右之旨

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M2140,3840h-217v-3840h217v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 言上訖然承久以来證文分明也任持忠譲与可被

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1867,3840h-226v-3840h226v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 成下安堵於持長至宮地条者雖帯貞治御下文

item.value: <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M1593,3840h-244v-3840h244v1920.0z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_06e92947-fe80-4b4a-b0ca-228018c7beca" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.chars: 為吉備津宮領之旨守護人注進之間可被除之矣

resource.chars: 永享二年十二月廿三日　對馬守貞清（花押）
